import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { PokemonDetailsContainer, FirstContainer, ImagesBox, SecondContainer, ThirdContainer, NameBox, AttackBox } from './styled' import Header from '../../components/Header/Header' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import GlobalStateContext from '../../global/GlobalStateContext' const PokemonDetailsPage = () => { const [chosedPokemon, setChosedPokemon] = useState({}) const {name} = useParams() const {pokemon} = useContext(GlobalStateContext) useEffect(()=> { const thisPokemon = pokemon.find((poke)=> { return poke.name === name }) setChosedPokemon(thisPokemon) },[]) return(
Poderes

{chosedPokemon && chosedPokemon.name}

 Ataques
) } export default PokemonDetailsPage
